title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the modified default value is not retained.
EB: The modified default value should be retained when reopening the Edit Parameter dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:

1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again to verify the default value.
